content:
Hello,

I have posted a couple of Bundles (type:messageHeader). Each of them belongs to an individual patient. What should be the query to be used to so that it returns with those two patient resources as output. I am not sure, whether this is the correct approach, please advise. Thanks.
@Tushar Nair, to clarify, you want to query for the bundles and also return the patients the bundles are associated with? Are the Bundles FHIR documents or messages?
(If not, there's nothing that would tell FHIR the Bundles are associated with particular patients...)
